name: Accelerate

News:

New prototype build is coming soon:

  • Better Physics
  • Menu
  • New Hud
  • New Cars and Maps
  • More Game Modes

This game will have arcade style gameplay, currently prototype and will add more features, improving gui, graphics, physics and much more

Update Build 18425:

  • Dynamic Trees
  • Tweak Post Processing
  • Speedometer
  • Lap Count
  • Best Lap Display fix 
  • Metallic car body

The demo is for 64-bit only
